SEARCH
Package appt

Class DoctorAppointment

java.lang.Object
appt.Appointment
appt.DoctorAppointment
public class DoctorAppointment extends Appointment
Represents a doctor's appointment, extending the base Appointment class. This class includes additional fields and methods for managing doctor-specific appointment details.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class appt.Appointment

    adminID, adminName, appointmentID, appointmentStatus, appointmentTime, diagnosis, doctorID, doctorName, medicine, medicineStatus, notes, patientID, patientName, treatmentPlan

  • Constructor Details

    • DoctorAppointment

      public DoctorAppointment(String appointmentID, Calendar appointmentTime, String patientID, String patientName, String doctorID, String doctorName, String appointmentStatus)
      Constructs a DoctorAppointment with specified details.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The unique ID of the appointment.
      appointmentTime - The time of the appointment.
      patientID - The ID of the patient.
      patientName - The name of the patient.
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor.
      doctorName - The name of the doctor.
      appointmentStatus - The status of the appointment.

  • Method Details

    • isAccepted

      public boolean isAccepted()
      Checks if the appointment has been accepted by the doctor.
      Returns:
      True if the appointment is accepted, false otherwise.

    • acceptAppointment

      public void acceptAppointment()
      Accepts the appointment, setting its status to "Accepted".

    • declineAppointment

      public void declineAppointment()
      Declines the appointment, setting its status to "Declined".

    • setOutcomeDetails

      public void setOutcomeDetails(String typeOfService, String medicationName, String consultationNotes)
      Sets the outcome details of the appointment, including type of service, medication, and consultation notes.
      Parameters:
      typeOfService - The type of service provided in the appointment.
      medicationName - The name of the medication prescribed.
      consultationNotes - Notes from the consultation.

    • manageAppointment

      public void manageAppointment()
      Manages the appointment, performing tasks related to the doctor’s involvement in the appointment. This method should be overridden to define specific management tasks.
      Specified by:
      manageAppointment in class Appointment

    • viewDetails

      public String viewDetails()
      Provides a detailed view of the appointment, including date, patient details, service, medication, and status.
      Returns:
      A string representing the appointment details.

    • updateSessionStatus

      public void updateSessionStatus(String newStatus)
      Updates the session status of the appointment, allowing the doctor to set it as Available, Unavailable, or Booked.
      Parameters:
      newStatus - The new status to be set for the appointment.
